name: Tex-Mex Chicken Casserole
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This is a version of the famous King Ranch Chicken casserole. Careful, it packs a bit of heat!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) bag nacho cheese-flavored corn chips (such as Doritos®), crushed
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of mushroom soup
1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread corn chip crumbs over the bottom of the baking dish and press crumbs into place
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir onion in melted butter until tender, 6 to 7 minutes
Stir diced tomatoes, cream of chicken soup
cream of mushroom soup, green chiles, milk, sour cream, chili powder, and cumin in a large bowl
Add chicken and cooked onion; stir to combine
Pour mixture over corn chips and top with Cheddar cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and cheese is melted, 55 to 60 minutes
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving
